name: update mobile
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the user password:

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id: STRING,
old_password: STRING,
new_password: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentors/updateMobile

raw 
  {
    "user_id": "1",
    "mobile": "88884244141"
}

Response:

404 - Not Found 

  {"status":404,"status_type":"error","message":"User not found","count":null,"data":"User not found"}
